title: How do we get there (mitigation)?
description:
You can explore here:
The essential means of mitigation to achieve a well below 2°C warming target for different scenarios.

  • How can a fossil fuel phase out be shaped?
  • How can the ramp up of low-carbon technologies look like?
  • What is the potential role of carbon sequestration?
  • How can the decarbonization of the electricity production happen?
  • What can the regional distribution of a fossil phase out look like?
  • What is the regional detail of a low-carbon ramp up?

This information can be explored for
  • different warming levels
  • with full or reduced availibility of carbon dioxide removal (CDR) technologies

options.label: How could a fossil phase out look like?

groups.label: Fossil phase out - FOSSILS without Carbon Capture and Storage (CCS)

How could renewables develop in the world regions?
